description:
Death the Kid shows up for his first day at Death Weapon Meister Academy, and Black☆Star and Soul decide to welcome him with closed fists instead of open arms.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La tanto discussa matricole. L`indimenticabile primo giorno di Kid alla Shibusen?
Le nouveau dont parle la rumeur ! Tant de souvenirs. Le premier jour de Kid à Shibusen ?
The New Student: Kid`s First Day at the Academy - Will It Be an Entrance to Remember?
Uwasa no Shinnyuusei! Omoide Ippai Kid no Shibotsu Sensei Toukou?
噂の新入生! ~想い出いっぱいキッドの死武専初登校?~
